mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `coupon` SET `couponNumber` = #{couponNumber}, `couponName` = #{couponName}, `couponEnd` = #{couponEnd}, status = 'Y', `couponPrice` = #{couponPrice}, `discountRate` = #{discountRate}, publishedDate = NOW(), food_id = null, event_id = null
mapper.select:
SELECT couponId, couponNumber, couponName, couponEnd, status, couponPrice, discountRate, publishedDate FROM coupon
WHERE status = #{option}

SELECT c.couponId, c.couponName, c.couponEnd, c.couponPrice, c.discountRate, f.name, f.price, fi.name fileUrl FROM coupon c, food f, food_file fi WHERE event_id = #{eventId} AND c.food_id = f.foodId AND f.foodId = fi.food_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_coupon SET coupon_id = #{couponId}, coupon_holder = #{memberId}, coupon_used = 'N', total_discountPrice = ( SELECT (c.couponPrice * (c.discountRate/100)) total_discountPrice FROM coupon c, food f WHERE c.couponId = #{couponId} AND c.food_id = f.foodId)
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.coupon_used, m.total_discountPrice, c.couponName, c.status, c.couponEnd, f.name FROM member_coupon m, coupon c, food f WHERE m.coupon_id = c.couponId AND c.food_id = f.foodId AND m.coupon_holder = #{memberId} AND c.food_id = #{foodId} LIMIT 1;
